# Expo / React Native

Mobile users expect apps to work offline. Syncular’s “local SQLite is the primary read + write path” model maps well to React Native.

## Recommended dialects

- **Expo managed workflow:** `@syncular/dialect-expo-sqlite`
- **React Native (Nitro SQLite):** `@syncular/dialect-react-native-nitro-sqlite`

## Minimal setup (expo-sqlite)

```ts
import { openDatabaseSync } from 'expo-sqlite';
import { createDatabase } from '@syncular/core';
import { createExpoSqliteDialect } from '@syncular/dialect-expo-sqlite';
import { ensureClientSyncSchema } from '@syncular/client';

const db = createDatabase({
  dialect: createExpoSqliteDialect({ name: 'app.db', openDatabaseSync }),
  family: 'sqlite',
});
await ensureClientSyncSchema(db);
```
